usefulItems: baking paper, spring form tin (Ø 22 cm), oven, refrigerator
title: Almond Cake with White Chocolate Topping

ingredients.content: 100 g butter, plus extra for greasing
150 g dark chocolate, small pieces or callets
150 g white chocolate, small pieces or  callets

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease and line a spring form flan tin (approx. Ø 22 cm).

Place dark chocolate and butter in mixing bowl then chop <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then melt <b>2 min/50°C/speed 2<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl then melt again <b>2 min/50°C/speed 1<b>.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Add eggs and sugar in mixing bowl then cook <b>10 min/50°C/speed 3<b>.
Add almonds and baking powder then mix <b>20 sec/speed 2<b>. Finish mixing with spatula then transfer to prepared tin. Bake for 20 minutes (180°C). Meanwhile, clean mixing bowl.Leave to cool in tin.
Place white chocolate in mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add butter and mix <b>4 min/37°C/speed 2.5<b>. Pour over cooled cake in tin then refrigerate for 2 hours. Remove from tin, cut in slices and serve.
